channel.title: Assa -> MM can be redirected
channel.description:
#### What happened? A Court Wizard managed to redirect me from a convertable to an unconvertable target.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Mastermind should be immune to redirection.
#### Steps to reproduce: Have Mastermind die before Day4 while being Assassin. Become Mastermind. Try to convert a target that is being swapped by a Court Wizard. Get redirected even though you should be immune to it.
#### Comments: None.

item.title: Assa -> MM can be redirected
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
I thought tornado bypassed redirection immunity. Maybe it doesn’t , haven’t played in a while

Read full topic

item.description:
It happened to me too

I just thought it was intended

Read full topic

item.title: Assa -> MM can be redirected

item.description:
What happened?

A Court Wizard managed to redirect me from a convertable to an unconvertable target.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Mastermind should be immune to redirection.

Steps to reproduce:

Have Mastermind die before Day4 while being Assassin. Become Mastermind. Try to convert a target that is being swapped by a Court Wizard. Get redirected even though you should be immune to it.

Comments: None.
